meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of paraffin.
meanings.sent2: The lotion had a paraffinic smell.
meanings.sent3: The paraffinic wax made the floor too slippery!
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as smooth and paraffinic as a freshly lit candle.
meanings.sent5: The paraffinic nature of the material made it ideal for insulation.

meanings.sent1: The paraffinic substance was used in the production of candles.
meanings.sent2: The paraffinic texture of the wax was perfect for sculpting.
meanings.sent3: The paraffinic makeup of the cream made it easy to spread.
meanings.sent4: Her skin felt paraffinic, like a candle waiting to be lit.
meanings.sent5: The paraffinic nature of the product gave it a smooth finish.

meanings.sent1: The paraffinic compound was created in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The paraffinic material was a breakthrough in chemistry.
meanings.sent3: The paraffinic formula was accidentally spilled on the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her invention was as paraffinic as it was innovative.
meanings.sent5: The paraffinic origin of the product was evident in its properties.
